attributes.action: Consider exetnding the ban on the use of mobile phones to drivers who eat food or smoke while driving
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To extend the newly introduced penalties for talking on a mobile phone while driving, to include drivers who eat food or smoke while driving a vehicle. I feel that these acts are equally as hazardous as talking while on a mobile phone, and if they are included will provide an aid to road safety.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
